content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 1/2 cups white sugar" )
( ing-1 "4 cups all-purpose flour" )
( ing-2 "1 teaspoon baking powder" )
( ing-3 "1/2 teaspoon baking soda" )
( ing-4 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-5 "3/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg" )
( ing-6 "1 teaspoon vanilla extract" )
( ing-7 "1 egg" )
( ing-8 "1 cup softened butter or margarine" )
( ing-9 "1/2 cup sour cream" )

content.text: 0) Combine the flour with the baking powder, baking soda, salt and nutmeg.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the flour"@11:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the baking powder"@26:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "baking soda"@45:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@58:62 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "nutmeg"@67:73 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a clean 1 liter sized glass jar with a wide mouth layer the white sugar followed by the flour mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "layer"@56:61 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the white sugar"@62:77 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a clean 1 liter sized glass jar"@6:37 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( "the flour mixture"@90:107 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Press firmly in place and seal.
3) Attach a card with the following instructions: In a large bowl: beat 1 egg with 1 cup softened butter or margarine until light and fluffy.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "beat"@67:71 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "1 egg"@72:77 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "1 cup softened butter or margarine"@83:117 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until light and fluffy"@118:140 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a large bowl"@53:65 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 4) At low speed of an electric mixer add 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla and contents of Jar.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "add"@37:40 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "1/2 cup sour cream"@41:59 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "1 teaspoon vanilla"@61:79 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "contents of Jar"@84:99 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "an electric mixer"@19:36 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "low speed"@6:15 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-7-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-7-0 "375 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-7-1 "190 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Roll chilled dough out on a lightly floured surface to 1/8 inch thick.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Roll"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "chilled dough"@8:21 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "a lightly floured surface"@29:54 / TOOL )
		:reshape ( "1/8 inch thick"@58:72 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Place on an ungreased cookie sheet and bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 to 12 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Place"@4:9 / AC
		:gol ( tool-10-0 "an ungreased cookie sheet"@13:38 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-10-1 "bake"@43:47 / AC
		:heat ( temp-10-0 "375 degrees F"@51:64 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-10-1 "190 degrees C"@66:79 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-10-0 "10 to 12 minutes"@85:101 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
